Former Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama ." He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's" Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks

the Fiat chief backing away from his previous remarks in a telephone conversation with labour minister Maurizio Sacconi . According to the ministry, Sergio Marchionne explained that he spoke in" hypothetical" terms and that nothing was decided, with no reference about a new location for the company's leadership for today or tomorrow.
